description: This file provides function declarations for the TLS Hso Client object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization functions for the TLS transport layer security implementation.

methods.name: TlsCreateHsoClient
methods.description: Creates a new Hso Client instance with specified context handles.

methods.name: TlsHsoClientCreate
methods.description: Creates a new TLS Hso Client object with specified context handles.

methods.name: TlsHsoClientRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified TLS Hso Client object.

methods.name: TlsHsoClientEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects for the TLS Hso Client.

methods.name: TlsHsoClientInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the TLS Hso Client object.
